name: 古碧源
objective:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
schedule:
1 (3/03,05): Biasing
2 (3/10,12): Discrete-circuit amplifers
3 (3/17,19): IC biasing
4 (3/24,26): Basic gain cell and CG/CB amplifiers
5 (3/31,4/2): Cascode amplifier, 4/2 放假
6 (4/07,09): Transistor pairings
7 (4/14,16): MOS differential amplifiers
8 (4/21,23): 老師出國參加研討會，本週進度調整至補課。
9 (4/28,30): BJT differential amplifers
10 (5/05,07): Low-frequency response
11 (5/12,14): High-frequency response
12 (5/19,21): Basics of feedback
13 (5/26,28): Feedback voltage amplifiers
14 (6/02,04): Other feedback amplifier types
15 (6/09,11): Basics of output stages
16 (6/16,18): Class A and Class B amplifiers
17 (6/23,25): Class AB amplifiers, 6/25 端午節放假。
18 (6/30): Final exam
scorePolicy:
期中考試：65%（2-3次）
期末考試：25%
平時與出勤考核：10%
materials: Microelectronic Circuits, International 7th Ed, Adel Sedra & Kenneth Smith, Oxford University Press, 2016.
